#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,k,r;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        k=n/4;
        if(n-k*4==0)
            printf("%d\n",k*k);
        else
        {
           r=(n-(k*4))/2;
           printf("%d\n",k*(k+r));
        }


    }
    return 0;
}
